alert.note: Alert for Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 27 at 9:48AM MDT until April 28 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Occasional heavy bursts of snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, with locally higher amounts possible. Higher snow totals are expected for elevations above 6500 Feet. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Northern El Paso County. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 6 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute over Monument Hill. Areas of heavy blowing snow and near-zero visibility possible at times. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft
